snippet: The interim leaders took a step toward setting up a permanent government for the post-Qaddafi era.
abstract: Libya's interim government takes first stop toward establishing a new government by laying out procedures for electing a planned constitutional assembly.
lead_paragraph: The interim leaders took a step toward setting up a permanent government for the post-Qaddafi era.

headline.seo: Libya Sets Plan for Assembly on Constitution
headline.main: Libya Begins Plan to Elect Assembly
headline.print_headline: Libya Begins Plan To Elect Assembly
